4 //Implementation of a generic PlannerBase class########################################################################################
5 //#################################################################################################################################
6 PlannerBase::PlannerBase(ros::NodeHandle &nh):nh(nh)
7 {
8  this->frame_name="/map";
9 
10  this->tim_sampling=this->nh.createTimer(ros::Duration(0.05),&PlannerBase::plan,this);
11 
12  this->pub_current_odometry=nh.advertise<nav_msgs::Odometry>("trajectory_odom",10);
13  this->pub_current_vel=nh.advertise<geometry_msgs::Twist>("trajectory_vel",10);
14  this->pub_current_pose=nh.advertise<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped>("trajectory_pose",10);
15  this->pub_path=nh.advertise<nav_msgs::Path>("simulated_path",10);
16  this->sub_reset_pose=nh.subscribe("reset_pose",10,&PlannerBase::resetCallback,this);
17 
18  ros::NodeHandle priv("~");
19  this->set_start_service=priv.advertiseService("start_planner",&PlannerBase::srv_start,this);
20  this->set_stop_service=priv.advertiseService("stop_planner",&PlannerBase::srv_stop,this);
21 
22  this->paused=ros::Duration(0,0);
23  this->start_reference.setIdentity();
24  this->is_planning=false;
25  this->iterations=1;
26  this->iterations_counter=0;
27 
28  this->start_pose=tf::Pose(tf::createIdentityQuaternion(),tf::Vector3(0.0,0.0,0.0));
29  this->vel=tf::Vector3(0,0,0);
30  this->pos=tf::Vector3(0,0,0);
31  this->ang_vel=0.0;
32  this->orientation=tf::createQuaternionFromYaw(0);
33 
34 
35 }
36 
37 void PlannerBase::load()
38 {
39  ros::NodeHandle priv("~");
40  if(!priv.getParam(PARAM_ITERATION,this->iterations))
41  {
42  ROS_WARN("Could not load %s",priv.resolveName(PARAM_ITERATION).c_str());
43  }
44  this->loadChild();
45  this->simulate();
46 }
47 
48 
49 
50 void PlannerBase::plan(const ros::TimerEvent& event)
51 {
52  if(this->iterations_counter==this->iterations)
53  {
54  this->iterations_counter=0;
55  this->pause();
56  }
57  if(this->is_planning)
58  {
59  ros::Duration local_time;
60  local_time=ros::Time::now()-this->start_time-this->paused;
61  this->calc_values(local_time);
62 
63  }
64  this->publish();
65 
66 }
67 
68 void PlannerBase::calc_values(ros::Duration local_time)
69 {
70  this->pos=this->get_position(local_time);
71  this->vel=this->get_velocity(local_time);
72  this->orientation=this->get_orientation(local_time);
73  this->ang_vel=this->get_angular_velocity(local_time);
74  this->check_period(local_time);
75  this->transformValues(this->start_reference,this->pos,this->vel,this->orientation);
76 }
77 
78 
79 
80 void PlannerBase::resetCallback(geometry_msgs::PoseWithCovarianceStamped msg)
81 {
82  tf::Pose pose;
83  tf::poseMsgToTF(msg.pose.pose,pose);
84  this->setStartPose(pose);
85 }
86 
87 
88 void PlannerBase::start()
89 {
90  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Starting planner");
91  this->start_time=ros::Time::now();
92  this->is_planning=true;
93 }
94 
95 void PlannerBase::pause()
96 {
97  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Pausing planner");
98  this->is_planning=false;
99 }
100 
101 bool PlannerBase::srv_start(std_srvs::EmptyRequest &req, std_srvs::EmptyResponse &res)
102 {
103  this->start();
104  return true;
105 }
106 
107 bool PlannerBase::srv_stop(std_srvs::EmptyRequest &req, std_srvs::EmptyResponse &res)
108 {
109  this->pause();
110  return true;
111 }
112 
113 void PlannerBase::setStartPose(tf::Pose pose)
114 {
115  this->start_pose=pose;
116  this->start_reference=this->getTransform(pose);
117  this->calc_values(ros::Duration(0.0));
118  this->vel=tf::Vector3(0.0,0.0,0.0);
119  this->ang_vel=0.0;
120  this->simulate();
121 }
122 
123 
124 void PlannerBase::publish()
125 {
126  nav_msgs::Odometry msg_odom;
127  msg_odom.header.frame_id=this->frame_name;
128  msg_odom.header.stamp=ros::Time::now();
129  tf::Pose pose(this->orientation,this->pos);
130  tf::poseTFToMsg(pose,msg_odom.pose.pose);
131  tf::vector3TFToMsg(this->vel,msg_odom.twist.twist.linear);
132  msg_odom.twist.twist.angular.z=this->ang_vel;
133  this->pub_current_odometry.publish(msg_odom);
134 
135  geometry_msgs::Twist msg_vel;
136  msg_vel=msg_odom.twist.twist;
137  this->pub_current_vel.publish(msg_vel);
138 
139  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped msg_pose;
140  msg_pose.header=msg_odom.header;
141  msg_pose.pose=msg_odom.pose.pose;
142  this->pub_current_pose.publish(msg_pose);
143 
144  this->pub_path.publish(this->trajectory_);
145 
146 }
147 
148 
149 void PlannerBase::simulate()
150 {
151  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Starting path simulation");
152  this->trajectory_=nav_msgs::Path();
153  ros::Duration sim_time (0.0);
154  while(sim_time.toSec()<300.0 && this->iterations_counter<1)
155  {
156  tf::Vector3 pos=this->get_position(sim_time);
157  tf::Vector3 vel=this->get_velocity(sim_time);
158  tf::Quaternion ori=this->get_orientation(sim_time);
159  this->check_period(sim_time);
160  this->transformValues(this->start_reference,pos,vel,ori);
161 
162  tf::Pose pos_tf=tf::Pose(ori,pos);
163 
164  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped pose;
165  tf::poseTFToMsg(pos_tf,pose.pose);
166  pose.header.frame_id="/map";
167  this->trajectory_.poses.push_back(pose);
168 
169  sim_time+=ros::Duration(1.0);
170 
171  }
172  this->trajectory_.header.frame_id="/map";
173  this->iterations_counter=0;
174  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Path simulation done");
175 }
176 
177 tf::Transform PlannerBase::getTransform(tf::Pose pose)
178 {
179  tf::Pose planner_start( this->get_orientation(ros::Duration(0)),
180  this->get_position(ros::Duration(0)));
181 
182 
183  tf::Transform trafo=pose*planner_start.inverse();
184  trafo.setRotation(pose.getRotation()*planner_start.inverse().getRotation());
185 
186  ROS_INFO( "Trafo applied on PlannerBase values: x-%lf y-%lf z-%lf theta-%lf ",
187  trafo.getOrigin().x(),
188  trafo.getOrigin().y(),
189  trafo.getOrigin().z(),
190  tf::getYaw(trafo.getRotation()));
191  return trafo;
192 }
193 
194 
195 void PlannerBase::transformValues(tf::Transform trafo,tf::Vector3 &pos,tf::Vector3 &vel,tf::Quaternion &ori)
196 {
197  tf::Transform rotate(trafo.getRotation(),tf::Vector3(0.0,0.0,0.0));
198  pos=trafo*pos;
199  vel=rotate*vel;
200  ori=rotate*ori;
201 }
